abstract: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services will no longer pay for services provided by Yorkville Endoscopy, Manhattan clinic where Joan Rivers went into fatal cardiac arrest; agency contends clinic no longer meets standards to supply ambulatory surgical services; and will terminate benefits effective Jan 31; clinic is appealing decision.
lead_paragraph: Yorkville Endoscopy has failed to correct the deficiencies implicated in Ms. Rivers’s death, according to a letter from the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.
snippet: Yorkville Endoscopy has failed to correct the deficiencies implicated in Ms. Rivers’s death, according to a letter from the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.

keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Manhattan Clinic That Treated Joan Rivers Will Lose Federal Funding
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Cut Off Funds for Clinic Where Rivers Was Treated
